## Upgrade Guide

### From v{PREV_VERSION}

```powershell
# Download the latest release
# Extract to your installation directory
# Your configuration files will be preserved
```

## Installation

### Requirements

- Windows PowerShell 5.1 or later
- Oracle 12c Instant Client
- Network access to Oracle database

### Quick Install

```powershell
# Clone or download release
git clone https://github.com/GeorgeMcIntyre-Web/SimTreeNav.git

# Or download release package
Expand-Archive SimTreeNav-{VERSION}.zip -DestinationPath C:\Tools\SimTreeNav
```
